This game is simply amazing. I haven't played basketball games in a few years now, so i guess i was taken back on how the graphics have evolved. It's like the players are actually there... their moves, their styles, everything about the game players are unique to the actual RL players. The way Jordan, shoots, walks, argues... or when he's tired, or laughing, i mean, IT'S JORDAN.

Well, just commenting again to say the torrent is awesome - i mean, i didn't download from here, i used the link i posted above, but i'm pretty sure it's the same as this. Installation was a breeze and this is easily the best, most complete NBA game ever created. Not only can u actually play all of Jordan's greatest games/series, but you can also play a career as him. From right out of college to an NBA star... how awesome is that?

Sorry if i come off as a little hyper... been playing this game for 2 days straight. lol.

Update your directx. This usually solves the no sound issues. 

As for viruses, usually there is only (one) potentially harmful things in most cracks. It's a false positive. 

However, if this game is showing more than one, then I would be wary. 

Note: 99% of all KEYGENS are false positives (from good uploaders like RELOADED and SKIDROW). 

However, I haven't downloaded this game yet. I was thinking about it, but now having hesitations due to the potential virus issue.
